item.title: Lots of deep potholes on high street where the bus stop is at the bottom of blacksmiths lane, 23rd September
item.description:
Lots of deep potholes need filling. I reported these ones months and months ago and was told that your contractors had said they werenâ€™t an issue then. They have got worse and worse and there are now more of them and deeper ones. They are diabolical to drive over and need to be filled.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Street, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Please clean and disinfecte the pavement in front of the communal bins area, 23rd September
item.description:
On the corner of Watts Street and Kelly Avenue there is a communal area for waste giant metal bins. Unfortunately it's getting absolutely disgusting filthy and extremely smelly because some irresponsible individuals don't put their waste correctly, in result every single day this corner is getting full of dirty and unhealthy rubbish and other stuff such as paint and so on. There is a big spot full of brown paint which looks like something else and it's absolutely disgusting. Please ask the cleaning team to clean and disinfecate the pavement in front of the communal rubbish bins area because it's absolutely unacceptable and unbearable to walk and live near such dirty and smelly corner of rubbish bins. Watts Street corner of Kelly Avenue. It could be great if the cleaning team would clean everything with great standard so we wouldn't have to report such horrible and awful mess on our streets. It's matter of health and safety.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 27, Watts Street, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
